title: Live querying: let’s explore Wikidata together!
abstract: You can find a lot of interesting, useful or amusing information on Wikidata – let’s spend half an hour writing some queries together!
description: This will be an interactive session to explore the possibilities of Wikidata, the free knowledge base, and its query service. Participants can suggest queries, and I’ll do my best to implement them.

persons.biography: Software developer at Wikimedia Germany and all-time Wikidata enthusiast.
